job.title: REMOTE Sr Software Engineer - Python, React, PostgreSQL, GraphQL
job.description: If you are a REMOTE Senior Software Engineer with experience please read onbrbrWe are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join our team in Overland Park KS You will work independently on complex assignments and assists in coming up with appropriate procedures on new assignments Youll also assist in serving as a resource to both internal and 3rd party team members on higher level issues as well as analyzing and designing specs of junior team membersbrbrWhat You Will Be Doingbrulli Utilizing technical expertise creates system requirements performs design and analysis and coding and unit testing of complex to highly complex system functionality andor defect correction across multiple platformslili Resolves complex technical design issueslili Provides functional andor technical guidance in evaluating applications systems or evaluating requests for proposalslili Coordinates changes and influences and prioritizes tasks with business or technical departmentslili Analyzes and influences technical system andor user requirementslili Identifies and creates solutions to improve system performance and availabilitylili Facilitates root cause analysis of system issues to minimize impact and future occurrenceslili Creates system documentationplay books and serves as a lead technical reviewer and contributor in requirements design and code reviewslili Analyzes and designs specifications for less experienced engineerslili Acts as a technical resource throughout the development life cyclelili May also actively contribute to the technical and soft skills development of team memberslili Assists team leads and management with delegation of work to cross functional and third party team members for execution through the full development life cyclelili Keeps management appropriately informed of progress and issueslili Coordinates system application transition from development teams to maintenance and production teamslili Constructs and implements necessary controls to assure systemapplication traceabilitybrliulWhat You Need for this Positionbrulli Pythonlili REACTlili PostgreSQLlili GraphQLlili API Gatewaylili AWS Lambdalili EC2lili Agilelili Microserviceslili SNSlili Excellent communication skillslili Fully REMOTEbrliulWhats In It for Youbrulli Competitive compensation 130215kyr DPElili 401k wmatchlili Full health benefits medical dental visionlili Generous PTOlili Fun work culturelili We pride ourselves in a healthy worklife balancelili So if you are a REMOTE Senior Software Engineer with experience please apply todaybrliulThis job is open to telecommute candidatesbrbrApplicants must be authorized to work in the USbrbrSo if you are a REMOTE Senior Software Engineer with experience please apply todaybrbrstronguEmail Your Resume In Word TobrbrustrongLooking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you Clicking apply is the best way to apply but you may alsobrbrNickValentiCyberCoderscombrulliPlease do NOT change the email subject line in any way You must keep the JobID linkedin  NV11639671  in the email subject line for your application to be
